Symptom: Haress code deployment pipeline failed to deploy drive code
Resolution: SSM updated password for id used for Harness Artifactory connector
Root Cause: SSM implemented password of the service account, but only updated 1 harness password secret entry out of 2, causing id to be locked
Recommended Solution: In future, SSM should update both harness password secret entries when updating the password of the service account

Symptom: Database connection error to prices database on host devhost08
Resolution: DBA restarted the database service on dev08
Root Cause: Database servie was terminated during Patching last night, causing the database to be inaccesible
Recommended Solution: In future, DBA should ensure that the database service is restarted after patching

Symptom: Production LRP restart_master_service as part of CTASK00378000 failed
Resolution: Prod Ops contacted Prod Control on call, and reset the Global values in UC4
Root Cause: The Global values for service restart needs to be updated on a monthly basis
Recommended Solution: Prod Control needs to automate the global value via scheduled UC4 job

Symptom: Shared services Config Deployment failed
Resolution: App services team regenerated the prod config and deployment was successful
Root Cause: Appconfigs for production environment were not generated
Recommended Solution: Dev teams should double check the config generation process before promoting to production repos

Symptom: F5 redirection script failed to redirect traffic to new server
Resolution: Network team on call was contacted, and they performed the redirection manually
Root Cause: The F5 redirection script failed for unknown reason, investigation is ongoing
Recommended Solution: N/A as the root cause is unknown

Symptom: Data Services on-call person did not show up to attend the on-call shift
Resolution: Secondary on-call person was contacted, and performed the assigned tasks
Root Cause: The primary on-call person had a personal emergency, but didn't inform the team
Recommended Solution: The on-call person should always inform the team if they are unable to attend the on-call shift, managers should also be informed

Symptom: After deployment of pricing modules, the Tomcat service did not start automatically
Resolution: SSM was contacted to manually restart TC services
Root Cause: The deployment script of pricing module had an update but did not point to the correct TC instance
Recommended Solution: Release team will perform update on pricing deployment script to fix this error

Symptom: WebLogic server failed to deploy WAR file during overnight release
Resolution: Middleware restarted the WebLogic server and redeployed WAR
Root Cause: The deployment job was triggered twice concurrently, causing lock conflict
Recommended Solution: Add lock mechanism in Jenkins pipeline to prevent concurrent runs

Symptom: Harness pipeline failed at Artifactory fetch step
Resolution: SSM updated the repository credentials in the connector
Root Cause: Service account password expired but no alert was configured
Recommended Solution: Set up password expiration monitoring and proactive renewal alerts

Symptom: Application failed to connect to Oracle database after patching
Resolution: DBA rolled back the patch and restarted the listener
Root Cause: Listener configuration was overwritten during Oracle patch installation
Recommended Solution: Manually back up listener.ora before applying any DB patches

Symptom: Post-deployment sanity checks did not trigger
Resolution: Manual sanity scripts were run by QA team
Root Cause: Deployment pipeline skipped sanity stage due to misconfigured if-condition
Recommended Solution: Review all pipeline conditionals as part of deployment validation

Symptom: VPN gateway unreachable during UAT release testing
Resolution: Network team restarted gateway service on edge router
Root Cause: VPN daemon had crashed during overnight config sync
Recommended Solution: Enable auto-restart for VPN services and monitor logs for crash patterns

Symptom: Automation test suite failed during pipeline run
Resolution: QA disabled flaky test cases and re-triggered suite
Root Cause: Recent code changes introduced race condition in UI test
Recommended Solution: Move unstable tests to nightly regression suite until fixed

Symptom: Git tag for release was missing
Resolution: SCM manually applied release tag and notified downstream teams
Root Cause: Tagging step was removed in a recent Jenkinsfile update
Recommended Solution: Add tagging validation in pre-release pipeline steps

Symptom: Data sync to S3 bucket failed post-deployment
Resolution: Manual data upload completed by DataOps
Root Cause: IAM role lost permission to write to target S3 bucket
Recommended Solution: Include IAM permission checks in pre-release checklist

Symptom: JMS queue overflowed during release rollout
Resolution: Old messages purged; queue size increased
Root Cause: Backlog from previous release wasn't cleared before deployment
Recommended Solution: Add queue clean-up step in release pre-checks

Symptom: Code promotion to production repo failed
Resolution: Engineer manually pushed changes with correct GPG key
Root Cause: Build server lost SSH auth config to production Git repo
Recommended Solution: Automate validation of SSH key presence in build agent

Symptom: Release candidate was not deployed to QA environment
Resolution: Pipeline was re-run manually with corrected config
Root Cause: Environment variable for target QA env was misspelled
Recommended Solution: Add validation step to check env vars before deployment

Symptom: Service health checks failed post-deployment
Resolution: SSM team restarted the failing pods and restored services
Root Cause: Service port config was changed without updating health check endpoints
Recommended Solution: Make port and endpoint mapping a mandatory checklist item

Symptom: SQL scripts failed during deployment
Resolution: Manual execution with minor syntax fix
Root Cause: Version mismatch between script and target DB schema
Recommended Solution: Run pre-deployment schema diff to catch version mismatches

Symptom: WebLogic cluster failed to start during application deployment.
Resolution: Middleware team manually restarted cluster nodes and cleared stuck deployment artifacts.
Root Cause: Undocumented dependency in class loading order caused startup failure under certain JDK versions.
Recommended Solution: Document all critical classpath dependencies and enforce baseline JDK validation during builds.

Symptom: Data pipeline failed to ingest pricing feeds from external vendor API.
Resolution: Integration retry logic was triggered and backfilled missing data after 45 minutes.
Root Cause: API authentication token expired and was not rotated automatically.
Recommended Solution: Implement scheduled token refresh jobs and add alerting on authentication failures.

Symptom: Production Git repository webhook failed to notify downstream CI pipelines.
Resolution: SCM re-registered the webhook and validated it with a manual push event.
Root Cause: An upgrade in GitLab broke webhook tokens due to format changes.
Recommended Solution: Test webhook behavior in staging before upgrading core SCM systems.

Symptom: Data pipeline failed to ingest pricing feeds from external vendor API.
Resolution: Integration retry logic was triggered and backfilled missing data after 45 minutes.
Root Cause: API authentication token expired and was not rotated automatically.
Recommended Solution: Implement scheduled token refresh jobs and add alerting on authentication failures.

Symptom: Users reported intermittent access issues to internal tools post deployment.
Resolution: The network team identified a routing issue and restored connectivity by reconfiguring the affected VLAN.
Root Cause: Deployment script triggered a restart of a core switch interface, resetting routing rules unexpectedly.
Recommended Solution: Audit all deployment scripts that touch networking infrastructure and isolate high-risk operations.

Symptom: Regression tests failed unexpectedly on the QA environment during the nightly pipeline.
Resolution: QA team analyzed the logs and found a mismatch in the test data set. Tests were updated and pipeline re-run successfully.
Root Cause: An automated data load process introduced incomplete records which caused test assertions to fail.
Recommended Solution: Introduce validation checks on nightly data load jobs and include them in the test pipeline gating.

Symptom: Production Git repository webhook failed to notify downstream CI pipelines.
Resolution: SCM re-registered the webhook and validated it with a manual push event.
Root Cause: An upgrade in GitLab broke webhook tokens due to format changes.
Recommended Solution: Test webhook behavior in staging before upgrading core SCM systems.
